subtitle: You can use sweet potato or yams in this recipe.

method.text: In a large bowl, mix all ingredients, except oil, together well. Divide mixture into equal servings. Shape into rounds. Flatten slightly to form flat cakes.
Heat enough oil in a frying pan to just cover the base.

Cook two at a time in the pan for 5 min on each side or until crisp and golden. Remove from pan and drain thoroughly on kitchen paper. Keep warm while frying the remainder. When all cooked, serve immediately.

title: Crispy yam cakes
